title: Research Plan for Comprehensive Data Analytics System
description: Strategic research questions for responding to the City of Charleston's RFP for a Comprehensive Data Analytics System

categories.heading: Business Drivers & Problem Statement
categories.subheading: C. Stated Goals vs. Implied Needs

categories.heading: Financial Research
categories.subheading: A. Budget Allocated for the Project

raw_results.query: [Agency Background & Strategic Alignment > A. Agency Mission & Vision] What are the long-term strategic goals of the City of Charleston Police Department (CPD) and how does the data analytics system align with these goals?
[Agency Background & Strategic Alignment > A. Agency Mission & Vision] How does the CPD's mission influence its approach to data management and analytics?

[Agency Background & Strategic Alignment > A. Agency Mission & Vision] What role does community engagement play in the CPD’s strategic vision, and how can the data analytics system support this engagement?
[Agency Background & Strategic Alignment > B. Current Initiatives & Priorities] What current initiatives is the CPD undertaking that could impact the implementation of a new data analytics system?
[Agency Background & Strategic Alignment > B. Current Initiatives & Priorities] How does the CPD prioritize its projects, and what factors are considered in these priorities?
[Agency Background & Strategic Alignment > B. Current Initiatives & Priorities] What are the specific technological needs of the CPD as they relate to their ongoing projects and objectives?
[Business Drivers & Problem Statement > A. Overarching Pain Points] What specific pain points has the CPD identified in their current data management practices?
[Business Drivers & Problem Statement > A. Overarching Pain Points] How frequently do delays in data processing impact decision-making within the CPD?
[Business Drivers & Problem Statement > A. Overarching Pain Points] Are there any regulatory or compliance pressures that could be influencing the CPD's need for a new data analytics solution?
[Business Drivers & Problem Statement > C. Stated Goals vs. Implied Needs] What are the specific implications of achieving the stated goals for the CPD's operational efficiency?

[Business Drivers & Problem Statement > C. Stated Goals vs. Implied Needs] How can the proposed data analytics system facilitate not only the explicit needs but also any implicit needs such as user training and system scalability?
[Business Drivers & Problem Statement > C. Stated Goals vs. Implied Needs] What qualitative benefits does the CPD hope to achieve beyond the quantitative metrics outlined in the RFP?
[Financial Research > A. Budget Allocated for the Project] What is the total budget allocated by the City of Charleston for this data analytics project, and how does it compare to past projects?
[Financial Research > A. Budget Allocated for the Project] Are there specific funding sources or grants that the CPD is relying on for this project that have stipulations or requirements?
[Financial Research > A. Budget Allocated for the Project] What is the budget breakdown for similar projects implemented by the CPD in the past?
[Technical Research > B. Current Tools/Technologies in Use] What existing data management systems is the CPD currently using, and what are their limitations?
[Technical Research > B. Current Tools/Technologies in Use] How do the current tools used by the CPD integrate (or fail to integrate) with the proposed data analytics system?

[Technical Research > B. Current Tools/Technologies in Use] What training or transition challenges have been encountered with current technologies that could inform the implementation of a new system?
[Competitive Intelligence > A. Who Else Might Bid] Which vendors have previously worked with the CPD on similar projects, and what has been their performance history?
[Competitive Intelligence > A. Who Else Might Bid] What competitive advantages do other potential bidders have that could influence the CPD's decision-making?
[Competitive Intelligence > A. Who Else Might Bid] How does the CPD perceive the strengths and weaknesses of other vendors in the data analytics space?
[Procurement Process & Decision Criteria > A. Evaluation Methodology] What specific criteria will the CPD use to evaluate proposals beyond the four factors listed in the RFP?
[Procurement Process & Decision Criteria > A. Evaluation Methodology] How will the CPD handle any conflicts of interest during the evaluation process?
[Procurement Process & Decision Criteria > A. Evaluation Methodology] Are there particular preferences for vendor qualifications or experience that the CPD might prioritize in their evaluation?
